item.title: Goodbye 2022! May 2023 Be Fabulous
item.description: 2022 has been kind to me with exciting changes and opportunities. Take a look at what I accomplished last year: 🏆 Received Excellence Award at Walmart ✨ Completed the Deep Learning Course on DeepLearning.ai 🤓 Started my dream job at Microsoft 📦 Moved to Seattle, WA - the Evergreen State 🎉 Got the Azure Data Engineering Associate Certification 🥾 Went on 12 amazing hikes in Washington state… and counting 🚤 Lead a highly visible data lakehouse migration project
